title: Not quite Universe
content:
Hi, I need to identify this typography in the Puma Dassler logo. I need to know the DASSLER and SCHUHFABRIK type. It really looks like Univers Ultra condensed. But still, it doesn’t fit.

Does anybody know?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dassler.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002455/http:/typophile.com/files/dassler.jpg) | 26.15 KB |

 [‹ ID needed for two type faces. Serif and Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002455/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42109 "Go to previous forum topic") [rough script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002455/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42095 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Landitus

comments.content:
Actually it looks like Univers Ultra compressed, but it lacks a Bold variant.  
And what abour the Puma type? Does anybody know which is it?

thanks again!

Could be [Folio Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002455/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/folio/bold-condensed/).

The PUMA logo is probably custom and hand-drawn.
